00020 
00021 eolBool eol_equals(eolDouble a, eolDouble b)
00022 {
00023   return (fabs(a-b) < EOL_EPSILON)?eolTrue:eolFalse;
00024 }
00025 
00026 eolVec3D eol_vec3d(eolDouble x, eolDouble y, eolDouble z)
00027 {
00028   eolVec3D vec;
00029   eol_vec3d_set(vec,x, y, z);
00030   return vec;
00031 }
00032 
00033 eolFloat eol_vec3d_magnitude (eolVec3D V)
00034 {
00035   return sqrt (V.x * V.x + V.y * V.y + V.z * V.z);
00036 }
00037 
00038 eolFloat eol_vec3d_magnatude_squared(eolVec3D V)
00039 {
00040   return (V.x * V.x + V.y * V.y + V.z * V.z);
00041 }
00042 
00043 eolBool  eol_vec3d_magnatude_less_than(eolVec3D V,eolFloat size)
00044 {
00045   return (eol_vec3d_magnatude_squared(V) < (size * size));
00046 }
00047 
00048 eolBool eol_distance_between_less_than(eolVec3D p1,eolVec3D p2,eolFloat size)
00049 {
00050   return eol_vec3d_magnatude_less_than(eol_vec3d(p1.x - p2.x,
00051                                                  p1.y - p2.y,
00052                                                  p1.z - p2.z),
00053                                        size);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void eol_vec3d_set_angle_by_radians(eolVec3D *out,eolFloat radians)
00057 {
00058   if(!out)return;
00059   out->x = cos(radians);
00060   out->y = sin(radians);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void eol_vec3d_normalize (eolVec3D *V)
00064 {
00065   eolFloat M = eol_vec3d_magnitude (*V);
00066   
00067   if (M == 0.0f)
00068   {
00069     return;
00070   }
00071   M = 1/M;
00072   V->x *= M;
00073   V->y *= M;
00074   V->z *= M;
00075 }

00086   r.y = y;
00087   r.w = w;
00088   r.h = h;
00089   return r;

00118   d->w = w;

00130   d->w = s.w;

00142   d->w = s.w;
00143   d->h = s.h;

00146 void eol_orientation_copy(eolOrientation *dst,eolOrientation src)
00147 {
00148   if (!dst)return;
00149   eol_vec3d_copy(dst->position,src.position);
00150   eol_vec3d_copy(dst->rotation,src.rotation);
00151   eol_vec3d_copy(dst->scale,src.scale);
00152   eol_vec3d_copy(dst->color,src.color);
00153   dst->alpha = src.alpha;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void eol_orientation_clear(eolOrientation *out)
00157 {
00158   if (!out)return;
00159   eol_vec3d_set(out->position,0,0,0);
00160   eol_vec3d_set(out->rotation,0,0,0);
00161   eol_vec3d_set(out->scale,1,1,1);
00162   eol_vec3d_set(out->color,1,1,1);
00163   out->alpha = 1;
00164 }
00165 
00166 void eol_orientation_add(eolOrientation * out,
00167                          eolOrientation   in1,
00168                          eolOrientation   in2)
00169 {
00170   if (!out)return;
00171   eol_vector_add_3D(in1.position,in2.position,out->position);
00172   eol_vector_add_3D(in1.rotation,in2.rotation,out->rotation);
00173   eol_vector_add_3D(in1.scale,in2.scale,out->scale);
00174   eol_vector_add_3D(in1.color,in2.color,out->color);
00175   out->alpha = in1.alpha + in2.alpha;
00176 
00177   if (out->alpha < 0)out->alpha = 0;
00178   else if (out->alpha > 1)out->alpha = 1;
00179   
00180   if (out->color.x < 0)out->color.x = 0;
00181   else if (out->color.x > 1)out->color.x = 1;
00182   
00183   if (out->color.y < 0)out->color.y = 0;
00184   else if (out->color.y > 1)out->color.y = 1;
00185   
00186   if (out->color.z < 0)out->color.z = 0;
00187   else if (out->color.z > 1)out->color.z = 1;
00188 }
00189 
00190 void eol_orientation_mix(eolOrientation * out,
00191                          eolOrientation   in1,
00192                          eolOrientation   in2)
00193 {
00194   if (!out)return;
00195   eol_vector_add_3D(in1.position,in2.position,out->position);
00196   eol_vector_add_3D(in1.rotation,in2.rotation,out->rotation);
00197   eol_vector_add_3D(in1.scale,in2.scale,out->scale);
00198 
00199   out->scale.x = in1.scale.x * in2.scale.x;
00200   out->scale.y = in1.scale.y * in2.scale.y;
00201   out->scale.z = in1.scale.z * in2.scale.z;
00202   
00203   out->color.x = in1.color.x * in2.color.x;
00204   out->color.y = in1.color.y * in2.color.y;
00205   out->color.z = in1.color.z * in2.color.z;
00206   
00207   out->alpha = in1.alpha * in2.alpha;
00208 
00209   if (out->alpha < 0)out->alpha = 0;
00210   else if (out->alpha > 1)out->alpha = 1;
00211 
00212   if (out->color.x < 0)out->color.x = 0;
00213   else if (out->color.x > 1)out->color.x = 1;
00214 
00215   if (out->color.y < 0)out->color.y = 0;
00216   else if (out->color.y > 1)out->color.y = 1;
00217 
00218   if (out->color.z < 0)out->color.z = 0;
00219   else if (out->color.z > 1)out->color.z = 1;
00220 }

00222 void eol_trail_new(eolTrail *trail,eolUint maxLen)
00223 {
00224   if (!trail)return;
00225   if (trail->trail != NULL)return;
00226   if (maxLen == 0)return;
00227   trail->trail = (eolOrientation *)malloc(sizeof(eolOrientation)*maxLen);
00228   if (trail->trail == NULL)return;
00229   memset(trail->trail,0,sizeof(eolOrientation)*maxLen);
00230   trail->maxLen = maxLen;
00231   trail->tail = &trail->trail[0];
00232   trail->head = &trail->trail[0];
00233 }
00234 
00235 void eol_trail_free(eolTrail *trail)
00236 {
00237   if (!trail)return;
00238   if (!trail->trail)return;
00239   free(trail->trail);
00240   memset(trail,0,sizeof(eolTrail));
00241 }
00242 
00243 void eol_trail_append(eolTrail *trail,eolOrientation orientation)
00244 {
00245   if (!trail)return;
00246   if (!trail->trail)return;
00247   trail->head++;
00248   if (trail->head >= &trail->trail[trail->maxLen])
00249   {
00250     trail->head = &trail->trail[0];
00251   }
00252   if (trail->tail == trail->head)
00253   {
00254     trail->tail++;
00255     if (trail->tail == &trail->trail[trail->maxLen])
00256     {
00257       trail->tail = &trail->trail[0];
00258     }
00259   }
00260   memcpy(trail->head,&orientation,sizeof(eolOrientation));
00261   if (trail->len < trail->maxLen)trail->len++;
00262 }
00263 
00264 eolBool eol_trail_get_nth(eolTrail *trail, eolUint n, eolOrientation *ori)
00265 {
00266   int i;
00267   eolOrientation *it;
00268   if (!trail)return eolFalse;
00269   if (!trail->trail)return eolFalse;
00270   if (!ori)return eolFalse;
00271   if (n >= trail->maxLen)return eolFalse;
00272   it = trail->head;
00273   for (i = 0;i < n;i++)
00274   {
00275     it--;
00276     if (it < &trail->trail[0])it = &trail->trail[trail->maxLen - 1];
00277   }
00278   memcpy(ori,it,sizeof(eolOrientation));
00279   return eolTrue;
00280 }
00281 
00282 eolUint eol_true_from_string(char * truth)
00283 {
00284   if ((strcmp(truth,"TRUE") == 0) ||
00285     (strcmp(truth,"true") == 0) ||
00286     (strcmp(truth,"True") == 0) ||
00287     (strcmp(truth,"1") == 0))
00288     return eolTrue;
00289   return eolFalse;
00290 }
00291 
00292 eolUint eol_false_from_string(char * truth)
00293 {
00294   if ((strcmp(truth,"FALSE") == 0) ||
00295     (strcmp(truth,"false") == 0) ||
00296     (strcmp(truth,"False") == 0) ||
00297     (strcmp(truth,"0") == 0))
00298     return eolFalse;
00299   return eolTrue;
00300 }
00301 
00302 eolInt eol_bool_from_string(char * truth)
00303 {
00304   if ((strcmp(truth,"TRUE") == 0) ||
00305     (strcmp(truth,"true") == 0) ||
00306     (strcmp(truth,"True") == 0) ||
00307     (strcmp(truth,"1") == 0))
00308     return eolTrue;
00309   if ((strcmp(truth,"FALSE") == 0) ||
00310     (strcmp(truth,"false") == 0) ||
00311     (strcmp(truth,"False") == 0) ||
00312     (strcmp(truth,"0") == 0))
00313     return eolFalse;
00314   return -1;
00315 }
